stories.headline: Vikings get former 1st rounder QB
stories.bodyText:
Coaches liked Max Brosmer but still wanted a proven veteran behind McCarthy, especially after Howell struggled to adapt to the system.

The Vikings even reached out to Daniel Jones and Aaron Rodgers in the offseason before settling on Wentz. Wentz has now joined his sixth team in six seasons.

stories.headline: Primetime exit
stories.bodyText:
Sanders was ejected from a Colorado game vs. UCLA in 2023 for a targeting hit just before halftime.
Sanders is fighting for the fourth and final spot at the position of safety.

stories.headline: LLWS FINALS
stories.bodyText:
Taiwan is aiming for its 18th championship, but its first since 1996, after edging Aruba 1–0 in the semifinal.
Nevada is playing for its first LLWS championship in history.

stories.headline: College Football Recap
stories.bodyText:
Beating another Power 5 contender on international stage positions Kansas State as an early playoff dark horse and sets the narrative heading into Week 1.

With the expanded CFP format, early Power 5 wins can boost playoff seeding and strengthen a team’s SOS metrics all season long.

stories.headline: Yankslide
stories.bodyText:
New York has now lost eight in a row to Boston, dropping to 1–8 overall against the Red Sox this season.
"Sucks," Yankees manager Aaron Boone said. "Feels really crappy. We got to get past it. We got to play better against these quality opponents in our division."

stories.headline: Thee's company, what's four?
stories.bodyText:
The Browns’ depth chart currently lists Shedeur Sanders as the fourth-string QB behind Joe Flacco, Kenny Pickett, and Dillon Gabriel.

Even more Browns QBs lurk! Deshaun Watson remains on the PUP list rehabbing his Achilles, while Tyler Huntley is on the 90-man roster.

questions.question: What does the Vikings’ decision to add Carson Wentz after Sam Howell’s struggles suggest about their quarterback depth chart?

options.text: They’re preparing to start Wentz Week 1
They wanted more experience behind McCarthy
They lack confidence in undrafted rookie Max Brosmer as QB3

questions.backstory: Coaches liked Max Brosmer but still wanted a proven veteran behind McCarthy, especially after Howell struggled to adapt to the system.
questions.funFact: The Vikings even reached out to Daniel Jones and Aaron Rodgers in the offseason before settling on Wentz. Wentz has now joined his sixth team in six seasons.

questions.question: Competing for a roster spot, Shilo Sanders was ejected after punching TE Zach Davidson. What similar discipline did Shilo Sanders face during his college career at CU in 2023?
questions.backstory: Sanders was ejected from a Colorado game vs. UCLA in 2023 for a targeting hit just before halftime.
questions.funFact: Sanders is fighting for the fourth and final spot at the position of safety.

questions.question: The U.S. team, Nevada faces Taiwan in the 2025 Little League World Series. How many all-time titles is Taiwan chasing?
questions.backstory: Taiwan is aiming for its 18th championship, but its first since 1996, after edging Aruba 1–0 in the semifinal.
questions.funFact: Nevada is playing for its first LLWS championship in history.

questions.question: Kansas State won the “Farmageddon” opener in Dublin over Iowa State — why could that result loom large for the Big 12 and playoff race?

options.text: It was the first Big 12 title game rematch
It gave them a marquee non-conference résumé win

questions.backstory: Beating another Power 5 contender on international stage positions Kansas State as an early playoff dark horse and sets the narrative heading into Week 1.
questions.funFact: With the expanded CFP format, early Power 5 wins can boost playoff seeding and strengthen a team’s SOS metrics all season long.

questions.question: With their 12–1 loss on Saturday, how many straight games have the Yankees dropped to the rival Red Sox this season?
questions.backstory: New York has now lost eight in a row to Boston, dropping to 1–8 overall against the Red Sox this season.
questions.funFact: "Sucks," Yankees manager Aaron Boone said. "Feels really crappy. We got to get past it. We got to play better against these quality opponents in our division."

questions.question: Which rookie quarterback the OTHER son of Deion — is fighting for a spot as the Browns’ fourth QB?
questions.backstory: The Browns’ depth chart currently lists Shedeur Sanders as the fourth-string QB behind Joe Flacco, Kenny Pickett, and Dillon Gabriel.
questions.funFact: Even more Browns QBs lurk! Deshaun Watson remains on the PUP list rehabbing his Achilles, while Tyler Huntley is on the 90-man roster.
